<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Strong Arm](/Feats.aspx?ID=1783) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you Strike with a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon, the weapon's [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) increases 10 feet.
name: Strong Arm
